subject: Re: [junit] Hi All
msgSnippet: ... Another reason (apart from the excellent ones already mentioned) is its easy integration with ant - which makes automated testing/building very easy. -- *
messageBody:
At 05:00 PM 15/10/01, you wrote:
>venkatesh srinivasan made a strange utterance something like this:
> >Now if anyone you can tell a solid reason/scenario for
> >which i have to use JUnit test framework, i will be
> >very much thankful...and most of the beginners can
> >have a clear understanding...........



Another reason (apart from the excellent ones already mentioned) is its
easy integration with ant - which makes automated testing/building very easy.
